cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each connect worker instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each connect worker task.

name.description: Name for this connect worker application

role.description: Deploy connect worker only on nodes with this role.

vip-label.description: Label for external access to connect workers. Format is <IP>:<port>

bootstrap-servers.description: Bootstrap servers for target Kafka cluster. Format is comma-separated list of <host>:<port>

key-converter-schema-registry-url.description: Schema Registry service (for message keys). Format is http://<host>:<port>

value-converter-schema-registry-url.description: Schema Registry service (for message data). Format is http://<host>:<port>
